text:
I developed a test web application and built my WEB.XML file.
Everything worked fine. As a test, I ported this over to
Weblogic. The Weblogic XML parser reported a problem. After 
further investigation, I noticed that my WEB.XML is wrong
according the the DTD. According the the WEB.XML DTD the 
<servlet> tags need to come before the <servlet-mapping> 
tags if I understand the DTD.

I guess my concern would be that Tomcat should pop up an
error when processing the WEB.XML. Otherwise, someone might
develope an app that could not be ported to other plateforms.

If my understanding ot the DTD is wrong, I would appreciate
the feed back too!

My WEB.XML is in the ENVIRONMENT DESCRIPTION.

Thanks.

Paul Garduno
creator: dev@tomcat.apache.org
